name: Legion (itch) (Szyntax)
description:
For the theme of creating mechanics across dimensions, I attempted to recreate the legion mechanics from Astral Chain but with my own spin on it.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - To move

Double tap S to fast fall

SPACE - To jump / double jump

Left Click - To Attack

Right Click (During slowdown) - Sync Attack

Left Shift - Sprint
